resources.string: You must know just 4 more steps to start!
Press it in order to get your location.
Do not forget to press Exit when your mission is ready.
Set your altitude, speed and other options available.
Now your mission is ready, Start and enjoy!
Step 1: Turn on the remote controller
Step 2: Connect mobile device to the WiFi network created by the remote controller
Step 3: Turn on the aircraft and wait until the remote controller has connected to the Aircraft. Then run the app
Step 1: Turn on the remote controller
Step 2: Turn on the aircraft and wait until the remote controller has connected to the Aircraft.
Step 3: Connect your mobile via USB to the remote controller. Then run the app
